Summary: brighter than a satelite moving slowly then stopping for 10 mins.
divs: Sighting Detailswhile enjoying my telescope in the backyard with my daughter we witnessed what i thought was the international space station going overhead. but the object stopped for approximately 10 mins. then it faded away.(many people in this area have witnessed strange objects during the spring of that year.I know of two people who have video of this and one making it to the northern daily news,(our local newspaper).I'm sure there are many more that have seen this around this area during that time period.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kirkland Lake
This sighting has never been favorited.
